timeline.message:
Inline usage of GtfsLibrary

Also remove EntityReplacementStrategy-related unused classes

timeline.bodyText: We now relay on the #toString method of ValueObjects (DesignPattern) a few places. Should we make this more explicit or is it ok?
timeline.author: t2gran
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +24,7 @@

     super(
         graph,
-        GtfsLibrary.convertIdToString(entrance.getId()),
+        entrance.getId().toString(),
